*excel: application/vnd.ms-excel
(cannont get excel to work)

pdf: application/pdf
for PDF include papersize option
environment Url/sheet/<sheetId>?paperSize=LETTER

csv: text/csv

request.description:
Retrieves all items in home including reports and templates

add loc override by adding ?loc={location}

i.e. 
fr_FR = french
en_EN = spanish
